intro: The v-footer component is used for displaying general information that a user might want to access from any page within your site.

usage.heading: Usage
usage.intro: The v-footer component in its simplest form is a container.

padless.heading: Padless Footer
padless.intro: The padless prop removes all default padding from the footer component.

indigo.heading: Indigo Footer
indigo.intro: The footer component with Indigo background color and social media icons and button.

teal.heading: Teal Footer
teal.intro: The footer component with a Teal color header and columns and rows of links.
